text: Purple Cane Road is a crime novel by James Lee Burke. ==Plot summary== Dave Robicheaux, former officer for the New Orleans Police Department and before that a U.S. Army infantry lieutenant who fought in the Vietnam War, James Lee Burke, Purple Cane Road, Simon & Schuster, 2018, page 16: "I PUT MY ARMY-ISSUE .45 that i had brought home form Vietnam on the seat of my truck". works as sheriff's deputy in New Iberia, Louisiana. In this book, he discovers new evidence in a murder case. ==Release details== * 2000, USA, Simon & Schuster, New York, ==References== Category:2000 American novels Category:American detective novels
